# Demographics table

```{r table01, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
tab1 <- tableby(genderhousehold ~., data=dem)
summary(tab1)
```

## Summary of roster (skills, education, etc )

```{r table02, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}

tab2 <- tableby(sec1q2 ~., data=roster)
summary(tab2)
```


##  Food security

This section discusses the food security situation over the past five years,... 
```{r table03, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='asis'}
tab3 <- tableby(genderhousehold ~., data=fs)
summary(tab3)
```

## What are the main shocks

```{r table04, results='asis'}
tab4 <- tableby(genderhousehold ~., data=shocks)
summary(tab4)
```

